snippet: BlackRock is introducing a new type of bond exchange-traded funds that aims to blend the best of active investing (security selection) with index investing (cost and consistency).
abstract: Fund giant BlackRock will begin offering new breed of bond exchange-traded funds to investors, seeking to combine best aspects of active investing and index investing; ETFs have become crucial profit driver for company, accounting for close to quarter of its $4.6 trillion assets under management.
lead_paragraph: BlackRock is introducing a new type of bond exchange-traded funds that aims to blend the best of active investing (security selection) with index investing (cost and consistency).

headline.main: BlackRock’s New Breed of Exchange-Traded Bond Fund Prizes Stability Over Swagger
headline.print_headline: A New Breed of Bond Fund Prizes Stability Over Swagger
